participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and supportive, loves literature and teaching.
participant_1.background: I will be graduating in september and hope to get a teaching job soon. My family migrated to america when i was five. I am in college now and want to be a teacher. My brother is in a metal band and travels the world.

participant_2.name: Ava
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, passionate about storytelling and the arts.
participant_2.background: Zebras are my favorite animals. I m allergic to milk. I dream of becoming a famous actress. I don t like the beach. I am a writer.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a writer.
That's cool! What kind of things do you write?
I mostly write short stories and novels.
Oh, that's awesome! I love to read. What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think one of my favorites is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
Oh, I love that book too! I read it in high school and it's stuck with me ever since.
Me too! It's such a beautiful and tragic story.
What are you working on right now?
I'm working on a new novel. It's about a group of friends who go on a road trip together.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's done.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm going to visit my family in California.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've always wanted to go to California.
It's beautiful! You should definitely go sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!
